title: UAE updates foundation stage admission criteria for British Schools: Key changes explained
summary_full: New rules for private schools with British curricula will assess children born September-December for Foundation Stage 1 readiness from 2026-27. A one-time transition allows 2022 births to be placed in FS1 or FS2 based on assessment.  Decisions are final.  Other curricula see 2021 births eligible for Kindergarten 1 next academic year.
